thread.title: Hotel Residence Henri IV - C'est Magnifique!
thread.title_full: Hotel Residence Henri IV - C'est Magnifique! - Review of Hotel Residence Henri 4, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Clams2017
title: Hotel Residence Henri IV - C'est Magnifique!
text:
We discovered this hotel online while looking for a property in Paris.
We wanted to stay in the Latin Quarter and wanted a boutique-style hotel.
This hotel exceeded our expectations!
The d√©cor of the room and entire hotel was very French Provincial.
The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable.
The rainforest shower was invigorating, especially after a long day of sight-seeing!
The service was excellent from Concierge to entire staff.
Hotel is close to excellent restaurants, shops and cafes and attractions (Notre Dame).
We felt welcomed, safe, pampered and cared for!
Looking forward to our return!
Room Tip: Rooms all great! Balcony is nice to have. See more room tips
